dataQuery.sqlStatement: select qfd.od_ob_fd_id od_ob_fd_id ,qfd.od_ob_ref_fdid od_ob_ref_fdid ,qfd.od_ob_fd_date od_ob_fd_date ,qfd.od_sc_region od_sc_region ,qfd.od_ob_vendor_name od_ob_vendor_name ,qfd.od_ob_factory_name od_ob_factory_name ,qfd.od_sc_factory_address od_sc_factory_address ,qfd.od_sc_audit_agent od_sc_audit_agent ,qfd.od_ob_primary_products od_ob_primary_products ,qfd.od_ob_iqc_pass_pct od_ob_iqc_pass_pct ,qfd.od_ob_iqc_sample_sz od_ob_iqc_sample_sz ,qfd.od_ob_iqc_defects od_ob_iqc_defects ,qfd.od_ob_qc_pass_pct od_ob_qc_pass_pct ,qfd.od_ob_qc_sample_sz od_ob_qc_sample_sz ,qfd.od_ob_qc_defects od_ob_qc_defects ,qfd.od_ob_fgi_pass_pct od_ob_fgi_pass_pct ,qfd.od_ob_fgi_qty od_ob_fgi_qty ,qfd.od_ob_fqc_sample_sz od_ob_fqc_sample_sz ,qfd.od_ob_fqc_defects od_ob_fqc_defects ,qfd.od_ob_qa_scope od_ob_qa_scope ,qfd.od_ob_fd_frequency od_ob_fd_frequency ,qfd.od_pb_auditor_name od_pb_auditor_name ,qfd.od_pb_qa_engr_email od_pb_qa_engr_email ,qfdd.od_ob_dc_id od_ob_dc_id ,qfdd.od_ob_inspection_type od_ob_inspection_type ,qfdd.od_pb_defect_sum od_pb_defect_sum ,qfdd.od_pb_defect_code od_pb_defect_code ,qfdd.od_ob_defect_pct od_ob_defect_pct from q_od_ob_factory_data_v qfd, q_od_ob_fact_data_defects_v qfdd where qfd.od_ob_fd_id = qfdd.od_ob_ref_fdid(+) and qfd.od_ob_fd_id = nvl(:p_fd,qfd.od_ob_fd_id) and nvl(qfd.od_ob_ref_fdid,'X')= nvl(:p_ref, nvl(qfd.od_ob_ref_fdid,'X')) and nvl(qfd.od_sc_region,'X') = nvl(:p_region,nvl(qfd.od_sc_region,'X')) and nvl(qfd.od_sc_audit_agent,'X') = nvl(:p_sour_agent, nvl(qfd.od_sc_audit_agent,'X')) and nvl(qfd.od_ob_vendor_name,'X') = nvl(:p_vendor_name, nvl(qfd.od_ob_vendor_name,'X')) and nvl(qfd.od_ob_factory_name,'X') = nvl(:p_factory_name, nvl(qfd.od_ob_factory_name,'X')) and nvl(qfd.od_ob_primary_products,'X') = nvl(:p_prim_prod, nvl(qfd.od_ob_primary_products,'X')) and nvl(qfd.od_ob_qa_scope,'X') = nvl(:p_scope, nvl(qfd.od_ob_qa_scope,'X')) and nvl(qfd.od_pb_auditor_name,'X') = nvl(:p_submitter, nvl(qfd.od_pb_auditor_name,'X')) and nvl(qfd.od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X') = nvl (:p_approver, nvl(qfd.od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X')) and nvl(qfd.od_ob_fd_frequency,'X') = nvl (:p_freq, NVL(qfd.od_ob_fd_frequency,'X')) and nvl(qfdd.od_ob_inspection_type,'X') = nvl (:p_ins_type,nvl(qfdd.od_ob_inspection_type,'X')) and nvl(qfdd.od_pb_defect_code,'X') = nvl (:p_def_class, nvl(qfdd.od_pb_defect_code,'X')) order by 1
